member.name: T:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Effects.VignetteEffect
member.summary: Fades out the edges of an image.

remarks.p: This Windows Runtime type corresponds to the D2D Vignette effect.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Effects.VignetteEffect.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the VignetteEffect class.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Effects.VignetteEffect.Source
member.summary: Gets or sets the input source for Vignette effect.
member.remarks: This property is initialized to null.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Effects.VignetteEffect.Amount
member.summary: Specifies the size of the vignette region as a percentage of the full image.

remarks.p: An amount of 0 means the entire image remains unfaded, while 1 fades the image in and then straight back out again with no part of it remaining 100% unfaded.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Effects.VignetteEffect.Curve
member.summary: Specifies how quickly the vignette color bleeds in over the region being faded.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Effects.VignetteEffect.Color
member.summary: Specifies the color to fade toward. Default value black.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Effects.VignetteEffect.ColorHdr
member.summary: Specifies the high-dynamic-range color to fade toward. Default value black.
